text:
HMD Ltd. has revamped syringe production to 5900 per minute. Mr. @RojerNath, Chairman & MD of HMD, said the recycled plastic would be used for non-medical use. Follow the thread to know more:

#Syringes #HMDHealthcare #SyringeProduction #Recycle #Vaccine #Vaccination #Covid19 https://t.co/itUsIlXkXm
